body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories         Star Chamber in Mammoth Cave, circa 1908.   In Mammoth Cave, there's a story under every rock, and behind every stalagmite â€“ ancient stories, and more modern, sometimes tragic, and other times full a kind of rustic humor. Together, they all tell a history of one of Earth's most marvelous places. Click here to delve into the chapters of A Brief History of Mammoth Cave.
title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Stories
